articles.title: Nepalese honorary diploma awarded to Secy. Kim Jong Il
Democratic amendment to "labour laws" urged
articles.content:
Nepalese honorary diploma awarded to Secy. Kim Jong Il
   Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- A ceremony for awarding
an honorary diploma of the Nepalese international forum to
the Secretary Kim Jong Il was held in Kathmandu on February 14
on the occasion of his 55th birthday.
   The honorary diploma was read out and handed to the head
of a delegation of the Korean Committee of for Cultural 
Relations with Foreign Countries by Minister of Housing and
Material Planning Balaram Gaharti Magar at the ceremony.
   The diploma carries a picture of Secretary Kim Jong Il with
a broad smile on his face under which it reads:
   We have the honour to present this honorary diploma to
Secretary Kim Jong Il, who is devoted his call to realising
global independence with embodiment of the immortal Juche 
idea, on the occasion of his 55th birthday.
   Chairman of the international forum Naba Raz Adikafi in
his congratulatory speech said:
   Led by President Kim Il Sung and Secretary Kim Jong Il,
Korea is now shining all over the world as an independent
and prosperous socialist power.
   Secretary Kim Jong Il has put into practice the immortal
Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung, wisely leading
the revolution and construction in Korea and putting his
heart and soul into realizing her reunification, the
cherished desire of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Hanziker's death caused by "Chongwadae"
articles.content:
Democratic amendment to "labour laws" urged
Pyongang,February 24(KCNA)--A meeting urging 
democratic amendment to the "labour laws" took place on the 
plaza of Seoul Railway Station February 22, sponsored by the 
confederation of trade unions in south Korea, with about 
2,000 workers and students in attendance, a Seoul-based 
radio said.
  At the meeting, the confederation complained that the 
discussion for rectifying the "labour laws" now under way in 
the "national assembly" involving the ruking and opposition 
parties is coming to an end with a few provisions in the 
evil laws dealt with, far from meeting the demand of working 
masses.
  The confederation repeatedly demanded that the "labour laws" 
be amended in a democratic way so as to meet 
international standards.
  It called for a thorough investigation into the Hanbo insident 
and a hearing of the case.
  The confederation's chairman Kwon Yong Gil in a press conference 
February 22 urged the regime to meet ten major demands 
including annulment of the systems allowing businesses to lay off 
workers and introduce flexible working hours and the recognition 
of the basic rights of teachers.
  He warned that in case the demands are not met, the confederation 
will stage the fourth-stage general walkout.

articles.title: Review of Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Hanziker's death caused by "Chongwadae"
   Pyongyang'February 24(KCNA) --U.S invastigation
authorities are suspecting that the south Korean
intelligence organ is involved in the death of an American,
Hanziker,and are launching a wholesale invastigation. 
He returned to the United States on  Novemver 27 last year 
after detained in the nortern half of Korea for spying 
activities and was shot to death in a hotel in seattle on 
December 18.The Seoul-based radio voice of National Salvation
reported this, qupting an American source.The radio said:
   The suspection is based on the fact that The south
Koreans showed most sensitive reaction to the case and felt
uneasy and that though a pistol was not found on the  scene
of the incident,The south Korean Authorities hurriedly
spread a rumor of suicide.
   When Hanziker was detained in The north for spying
activities the south Korean intelligence organ manipulated
mass media  to argue that the north detained The American
without reason. The South Koreans strained every nerve to
create new mistrust between  the north and the United States
and begged the U.S to put bigger pressure upon the  north
with the incident as an occasion.
  But,the U.S. Administration dispatched democratic member 
of the house of representatives Richardson to the as a 
Presidential envoy to make an dfficial apolpgy to the north
and take Hanziker back to the U.S.
   Hanziker confessed in the north that he was an agent of
the agency for national security planning of south Korea
and ,back home,he did not slander the north but spoke good
of the north,which infuriated  the south Korean authorities.
   Judging from this, the U.S investigation authorities
suspect that Chongwade instructed it's intelligence agents
in the U.S to kill him.
   According to their initial investigation,on December 5
last year a week after Hanziker returned to the United
States a telephone order for arranging the day of killing
Hanziker came to an ANSP agen at the south Korean Embassy
in Washington from Seoul.
   The agent mailed a letter to Hanziker in name of
Hanziker's maternal uncle,so that Hanziker went to a hotel
in seattle.
   A hotel clerk confirmed that a strange man and woman of
south Korea took a room next to Hanziker's and had access to
Hanziker. Witnessed said the car in which the couple
disapperared after the shooting incident belonged to the
south Korean Embassy. The south Korean  Embassy in Washington,
afraid of a big trouble which will affect the relations with 
the United States in case the incident turns out to have been 
made by the ANSP,is making a fuss to mislead the U.S.
invastigation.

articles.title: Truth behind Hanbo scandal must be made clear= s. Korean opposition leader
articles.content:
Review of Rodong Sinmun
   Pyongyang,February 24(KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today reports 
that Secretary Kim Jong Il sent thanks to officials of the 
Ministry of Public Security for actively contributing to 
discovering to evidence of the struggle of people and 
guerrillas in the area of MT.Kuwol,south Hanghae province,in 
the faterland liberation war and postwar period and to the 
creating staff and officials of the Korean documentary and 
scientific film studio for achieving great success in their
work.
   Carried in the paper is a message of thanks to Secretary
Kim Jong Il from the Central Strading Committee of the
General Association of Korean Residents in Japan for the 
educational aid funds and stipends he sent to Chongryon.
   It gives accounts of a ceremony for awarding an honorary
diploma of the Nepalese international forum to Secretary
Kim Jong Il and of an inaugiral meeting of the study group
of Secretary Kim Jong Il's idea of youth movement held in
Guyana and of events held in different countries on the
occasion of his 55th birthday.
   The paper devoted nearly one whole page to a white paper
issued by the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful
Reunification of the Fatherland on the crimes commited by
Kim Yong Sam in four years of office.
   It runs an article stressing that solidality of the
north,south and overseaks Koreans is a fundamental guarantee
for national independence and peace.
   It carries articles on the U.S.military base in 
Okinawa,rootcause of misfortune and hardship,and on the
disputes over the Caspean sea

articles.title: Tasks for materializing proposal of joint meeting discussed
articles.content:
Truth behind Hanbo scandal must be made clear=S. Korean opposition leader
  Pyongyang,February 24 (KCNA) -- President of the 
opposition "National Congress for New Politics" Kim Dae Jung 
held that the Hanbo scandal is a "power-based irregularity made by the Kim Young Sam 
"government", a Seoul-based radio said.
  Speaking in a meeting on February 22, he said the Hanbo scandal is an incident made by the 
Kim Young Sam regime in a bid to repay the favours shown by the general chairman of the Hanbo 
group, Jong Thae Su, who offered tens of billions 
of won as "presidential election" fund in 1992. Kim Dae Jung said Kim Young Sam shoukd be 
held responsible for the scandal.
  He said the prosecution cannot be trusted as long as it treats 
Kim Hyon Chol, son of Kim Young Sam and the mastermind of the scandal, 
as a plaintiff.
  Kim Dae Jung demanded that the truth behind the Hanbo scandal should be 
made clear through tekevised "parliament" hearing so that all people can understand it.

articles.title: Kim Young Sam should stand trial, says NDFSK mission in Cub
articles.content:
Tasks for materializing proposal of joint meeting discussed
  Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Enlarged Executive omcmittee Meetins of 
the C.C., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League were held here.
  The meetings discussed tasks of the organizations and their members to 
carry into practice the proposal of the joint meeting of political parties and 
organizations in the northern half of Korea for waging a nationwide struggle 
to realize national independence and defend peace.
  The meetings expressed full support to the proposal, as entirely justifiable one, 
which was put forward by the joint meeting to make this "a year of solidarity of 
the north, south and overseas Koreans for national independence and peace", 
conduct a joint struggle for it and convene a meeting of representatives of political 
parties and organizations in the north, south and overseas this year, 
the 25th anniversary of the publication of the July 4 joint statement.
  The meetings ardently appealed to organizations in south Korea to support 
the proposal wit a patriotic standpoint and decisively turn out in the nationwide 
struggle to realise national independence and defend peace.

articles.title: CPRF on crimes of Kim Young Sam
articles.content:
Kim Young Sam should stand trial, says NDFSK mission in Cuba
  Pyongyang, Febuary 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Young Sam should open to the public the Hanbo 
incident-related irregularities and stand trial, said the deputy chief of the 
mission of the National Democratic Front of South Korea(NDFSK) in Cuba, Kim Chang Su.
  He called a press conference on February 17 with regard to the continued revelation 
of the seamy side of the incident.
  Referring to Kim Young Sam's ruling crisis that has been worsened by the recent revision 
of evil laws and Hanbo incident, he said it a logical result to him.
  Successive rulers of south Korea and their clans were all fascist dectators and robbers.
  But any foul human scum, special class political profiteer and special class robber 
cannot stand beside Kim Young Sam, he said, noting  the Hanbo scandal must have been 
committed with the involvement of Kim Young Sam.
